dialogue: Businesses used to be like Christianity; if you were faithful and obedient, you could obtain bliss in the afterlife of retire-
Now it's more of a reincarnation model.
If the worker learns enough in his current job, he can progress to a higher level of employment elsewhere.
These analogies aren't working for you, are they, Bob?
My hope is that one day I will biodegrade and become "WD-40" oil.
